content: I was able to decrypt it with https://futureboy.us/stegano/decinput.html. The text is below: Hello, from Genesis Mining! You've figured it out - this image had a hiddenmessage in it all along!You probably already know who we are, but just incase, we're www.genesis-mining.com - and we provide hashing power forcryptocurrencies.As a reward, you've received a 5% discount on any order -just enter EasterEggnigma at the checkout of any order, and enjoy!Thankyou, and Happy Easter!Sincerely yours,Genesis Mining
